name: Advance Slider
author: rajubdpro

sections.description:
Advance Slider adds a powerful and customizable slider feature to your WordPress site. Easily display responsive sliders with various options to enhance your site’s visual appeal.

Features

  • Customizable slider options
  • Responsive design for all devices
  • Easy integration with shortcode
sections.installation:
1. Upload the advance-slider folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Use the [AWP-SLIDER] shortcode to add sliders to your posts or pages.
sections.faq:
Do I need technical skills to use this plugin?

No, no technical skills are required. The plugin is designed to be user-friendly.

short_description: Short Description: Enhance your WordPress site with a customizable and responsive slider using the Advance Slider plugin.
